Body:
init = Job(posinp=self.posH2O, calculator=self.calcH2O)
init.run('energy')
assert np.isclose(init.results['energy'][0], -2076.7576, atol=0.0001)
geo = Geopt(posinp=self.posH2O, calculator=self.calcH2O)
geo.run()
assert 0.964 < geo.final_posinp.distance(0, 1) < 0.965
assert geo.final_posinp.distance(0, 1) - geo.final_posinp.distance(0, 2
    ) < 0.0001
final = Job(posinp=geo.final_posinp, calculator=self.calcH2O)
final.run('energy')
assert np.isclose(final.results['energy'][0], -2078.6301, atol=0.0001)
